document.full_text: pakistan will launch a military offensive in north waziristan, a newspaper reported on monday, days after u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton reiterated a u.s. demand to tackle sanctuaries for al qaeda and the taliban on the afghan border.
document.title: pakistan to launch offensive in north waziristan: report
lines_and_colors: pakistan will launch a military offensive in north waziristan, a newspaper reported on monday, days after u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton reiterated a u.s. demand to tackle sanctuaries for al qaeda and the taliban on the afghan border.
